title: 领地权限组设置问题
author: Ghost__
txt_content:
Groups:
    Default:  #默认配置
       # Information about the Residence zone that the player can define.
       #Uncomment the lines below to mirror this config to other groups.
       #Mirror:
         #- 'group1'
         #- 'group2'
       Residence:
           # Determins if this group can create residences or not.  This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create'
           CanCreate: true
           # The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
          MaxResidences: 10
           .........
    Builder: #自己添加新组
       # Information about the Residence zone that the player can define.
       #Uncomment the lines below to mirror this config to other groups.
       #Mirror:
         #- 'group1'
         #- 'group2'
       Residence:
           # Determins if this group can create residences or not.  This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create'
           CanCreate: true
           # The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 20

我想知道新组那里该填什么 我权限组叫做黑骑士 是否填写 黑骑士 三个字？如果不是能举例说明吗！！！

replies.author: mcmyu_s
replies.txt_content: 可以填写，不过还是英文靠谱

replies.txt_content:
